content: the loretta socks are worked from the cuff down with a textured cuff made of half twisted rib cable and lace which blends into stockinette the pattern includes 2 heel options to choose from charted and written instructions **lace pattern ** the lace pattern will look slightly different on certain sizes the sample shows the lace as graded for sizes 64 and 68 sizes 56 72 and 76 have one extra line of twisted stitches between each repeat size 60 has 3 extra sts of half twisted ribbing between each repeat **yarn ** you will need about 400 m 438 yds of fingering weight sock yarn the sample was knit using lana grossa meilenweit seta 400 m 437 yds / 100 g in 33 **needles ** 2 25 mm us 1 circular needles or dpns or size required to get gauge **gauge ** 32 sts x 40 rnds per 10 cm 4 in stockinette after blocking **sizes ** the pattern is written for a 56 60 / 64 68 / 72 / 76 stitch count 17 5 19 / 20 21 5 / 22 5 / 24 cm 6 ¾ 7 ½ / 7 ¾ 8 ½ / 8 ¾ / 9 ½ finished circumference measure your foot at its widest point under the toes and choose a size with about 2 5 cm 1 negative ease **notions ** tapestry needle and scissors stitch markers cable needle optional row counter recommended **techniques used ** socks are knit cuff down textured cuff using half twisted rib eyelets simple and double decreases simple cables 2 heel options heel flap + gusset / german short row heel rounded toe with simple decreases grafting pattern includes charted and written instructions --------------------------------------------------------------- les chaussettes loretta se tricotent depuis la
